name: Turnip and Cabbage Slaw With Yogurt Dressing
keywords: cabbage, greek yogurt, turnip, raw, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon plus 1 pinch kosher salt, more to taste
1/2 head cabbage, cored and shredded (6 cups)
4 medium turnips (3/4 pound), peeled, and julienned or coarsely grated (2 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop garlic. Sprinkle with a pinch of salt; using the flat side of a knife, mash garlic to a paste. In a small bowl, whisk together garlic paste, 1 teaspoon salt, yogurt and oil. Season with pepper.
In a large bowl, combine cabbage, turnips, dressing and dill. Toss well to combine. Let stand 10 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning; serve.

video.name: Julienning Turnips
video.description: Melissa Clark shows how to julienne a turnip into matchstick slices without using a mandolin or food processor.
